get.summary: Retrieves cargo tracking details by tracking number.
Retrieves all cargo shipments associated with the current user.

post.summary: Creates a new cargo tracking entry (Admin/Manager only).

put.summary: Updates the status of an existing shipment (Admin/Manager only).

get.summary: Retrieves all categories.
Retrieves all auto categories (cached).

post.summary:
Invalidates the auto categories cache.
Should be called when auto categories are modified.

get.summary: Retrieves a specific category by ID.
Get all products (API Key protected)
Get all categories
Get all brands
Get orders
Check API Key validity
Gets the list of companies the current user is a member of.

post.summary: Joins the current user to a specific company.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The ID of the company to join

delete.summary: Removes the current user's membership from a specific company.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The ID of the company to leave

get.summary: Searches for companies by name. Returns summary including membership status.
Retrieves successful orders for the current user.
Retrieves failed orders for the current user.
Retrieves a paginated list of all products with optional filtering.
Retrieves a single product by its unique identifier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the product

get.summary: Get products by category ID with optional filtering.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The Category ID to filter by (required)

get.summary: Retrieves products belonging to a specific cluster (AI grouping).

parameters.name: clusterId
parameters.description: The Cluster ID to filter by

parameters.name: prioritizedIds
parameters.description: Optional list of product IDs to prioritize in ordering

get.summary: Search products by query text in name, SKU, or description.

post.summary: Creates a new refund request for a specific order item.

get.summary: Retrieves all refund requests for the authenticated user.
Gets all pending tasks assigned to the authenticated user.
Gets all tasks for the company (Manager only).

post.summary: Marks a task as completed (e.g. Packaging).
Completes a shipping task by providing a tracking number.

put.summary: Updates the current user's profile (Phone, Address).

401.description: If the user is not authenticated

404.description: If the user is not found

requestBody.description: Password change information containing current and new password

400.description: If current password is incorrect or input is invalid

401.description: If the user is not authenticated

put.summary: Changes the current user's email address.

requestBody.description: Email change information containing new email and current password for verification

400.description: If password is incorrect, email is already taken, or input is invalid

401.description: If the user is not authenticated

ChangeEmailDto.description: Data transfer object for changing user email.

ChangePasswordDto.description: Data transfer object for changing user password.

companyId.description: ID of the company selling this product

brandId.description: ID of the brand associated with the product

autoCategoryId.description: Auto-generated Category ID from AI analysis

variants.description: List of product variants (color, size, etc.)

isBlockedByCompany.description: Indicates if the product is blocked by the current user's company settings

ProductDto.description: Data Transfer Object for Product details

UpdateUserProfileDto.description: Data transfer object for updating user profile information.

coverImage.description: URL of the cover image for this variant

isCustomizable.description: Indicates if the variant is customizable

VariantProductDto.description: Data Transfer Object for Product Variant details

tags.name: Cargo
tags.description: Manages cargo tracking and shipping information.

tags.name: Refunds
tags.description: Handles refund requests and their status retrieval.

tags.name: Tasks
tags.description: Manages worker tasks (Packaging, Shipping) and order workflow steps.
